description: Regional Project to Develop the Capacity of CSOs to Participate Policymaking in RBA Countries

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The objective of the project is to expend civil society participation in policy processes involving governments and the United Nations to promote national ownership, equitable development and inclusion.  The project will support participatory civil society assessments which can form the basis of informed engagement between UNDP and national civil society ators in priority areas of development.
subproject.title: RAF/06/005 - Develop. Capacity

title: RAF/06/005 - Develop. Capacity of Civil Society Org.
